Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Reroute at Northwest Highway/ Nettleton
ShortDescription: 68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted  near Northwest Highway/ Nettleton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted near Northwest Highway/ Nettleton. 

Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Northwest Highway, Newark, Raven, and Northwest Highway including normal route streets  due to street blockage near Northwest Highway/ Nettleton. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/Garfield
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine are temporarily rerouted due police activity near Racine/Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 59h, Ashland, 5th, and Racine including normal streets  due to police activity near Racine/Garfield. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway are temporarily rerouted via due to a festival.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Halsted, Belmont, and Broadway including regular routes due to a festival. .

Allow extra travel time.
